description: Students study the musical history of hymnody and its relationship to the history of the church. In addition, this course explores the Biblical Psalms and their use in worship of the church and includes references to their musical settings in Gregorian chant, Anglican chant, responsorial settings, and choral music. Offered Interim 2007 and alternate years.
name: Music/Chr Worship
notes: Open to non-music majors. Open to first-year students.
title: Music in Christian Worship
